## Checklist

- [ ] `cargo test` passes
- [ ] `cargo fmt` has been run
- [ ] `cargo clippy` has been run (no new warnings, or justified)
- [ ] Docs / README updated if needed
- [ ] CHANGELOG or commit message is clear (if notable)
